data_description.zone_urls: Enter the URLs of the GeoJSON files that contain the zones you want to track. this supports both websites and files in the /config directory
data_description.prioritize_zone_files: If you want to prioritize the order of the zone files, enable this option. this means that if a tracker is in multiple zones it will only consider those with the lowest priority
data_description.registered_entities: Select the entities that you want to track in the zones. You can only track an entity once

error.unreachable_url: One or more urls cannot be reached
error.invalid_path: The file could not be found
